User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:7.0a1) Gecko/20110622 Firefox/7.0a1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:7.0a1) Gecko/20110622 Firefox/7.0a1

On WinXP, calling system suspend (Ctrl+Alt+Del) and then insuspend on page with opened canvas make it blank (white) / not rendering properly unless resizing window or switching to other tab and back.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open given URL
2. invoke system suspend dialog (on winxp Ctrl+Alt+Del)
3. cancel this dialog (via cancel or esc)

Actual Results:  
canvas regions on the currently opened page are whit/blank, not rendered
even mouseover does not help

Expected Results:  
user expects to see the page in the state when he left it

Sometimes is canvas area not white but filled with some messy graphics artifacts...
